author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Update the CMSSW utilities for Alpaka v1.1.0.

This is required to go together with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9010 .

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass.

#### Backport status

Backport of #43772 from the same branch.
title: Update Alpaka to version 1.1.0 [14.0.x]
